# Description

## Introduction

Include open graph tags (aka facebook) in doc pages.

Add the following code to page_frameset.html
```

					${doc_og?default("")}
				
```



[Maven documentation and reports](http://dev.lutece.paris.fr/plugins/module-document-include-opengraph/)
